firstThreeBlogPosts.title: BigTransfer Encoder vs CLIP Image Encoder
firstThreeBlogPosts.author: Alex C-G
firstThreeBlogPosts.description: We aim to test the two types of image encoders that can be compared for a similarity (“nearest neighbor”) search. Let's see who is the winner!
